'''The Children of God Shall Dance''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete ''[[Sunchildren Hide and Seek]].''

==Trivia==
*The name of this achievement is a reference to the original Japanese name of the 2000 short story collection {{w|After the Quake}} {{Lang|ja=神の子どもたちはみな踊る|ja_rm=Kami no Kodomo-tachi wa Mina Odoru|ja_tl=All God's Children Can Dance}}, by Haruki Murakami.
